des: "Grated fresh ginger root and brown sugar mixed with a prepared teriyaki sauce makes a tangy marinade for salmon or other seafood steaks."
ins: Combine Kikkoman Teriyaki Marinade & Sauce, brown sugar, and grated ginger root. Pour mixture over salmon* in a large sealable bag. Marinate for 30 minutes, turning bag over once. Grill following your favorite method.
